sentences.sContent: The medical system is facing collapse because of an exodus of doctors.
sentences.sCn: 由于医生大批离去，该医疗体系正面临崩溃。

remMethod.val: ex(出) + od(路) + us → 走上外出的道路 → 大批离去

trans.tranCn: 大批离去， 成群外出
trans.tranOther: If there is an exodus of people from a place, a lot of people leave that place at the same time
